message.body: Sure - I have a lesson at 3 today but I'll be around otherwise, and tomorrow I'll be free after 2 or so. Give me a call whenever!
I'm actually not riding Louie this afternoon. I forgot I told my boyfriend I'd go to his brothers house with him. So If you want to ride Louie you can!
Ok, thank you! Let me check with Tanya, I'll either ride him for my lesson or hack him.Â
Want me to do anything with the cut - scrub it out or put anything on it?
Would you mind putting the ice boot one and wrapping it after? The ice boot is in the freezer in the garage and the wrap is on my trunk?
Sure - does the wrap stay on overnight?
Yes. Thank you very much!!! I'm an airhead and forgot I had these plans this afternoon
No problem! I'm gonna lesson on dollar & hack Louie. I'll let you know if he feels off at all.
Thanks. The stiffness for the first 10 minutes is normal. Lol
Yup, Tanya warned me about that!

Hey, Louie did feel off on that left front - ok at the walk, not so much trotting right, really noticeable trotting left. I iced ~20 minutes & wrapped. That boot is great, much easier than cold hosing!
Thanks! I thought me might be off. I appreciate you taking care I him. And I love the ice boot! It's Tanya's
